section.heading: Electronic inventory control system for surplus property.
section.text: The CPO shall establish an electronic inventory control system to monitor all surplus property. The system shall contain the following information:

para.text: The date of the receipt of the surplus property;
The agency or organization from which the surplus property was received;
A description of the surplus property, including quantity and condition;
A photograph of the surplus property; and
The estimated value of the surplus property.
